neighbors.name: John & Shelley Barnes
neighbors.claims: John and Shelley Barnes are listed as landowners in Cochise County, Arizona property records ([publicrecords.netronline.com](https://publicrecords.netronline.com/state/AZ/county/cochise#:~:text=Go%20to%20Data%20Online)). No references in local meetings or news indicate that either has taken a public position on development or energy projects ([www.cochise.az.gov](https://www.cochise.az.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=384#:~:text=subscriptions%2C%20save%20form%20progress%20and,COCHISE%20COUNTY%20BOARD)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Since their views are not documented, reach out in a friendly, informal way to learn about any concerns or questions they have.

overview_summary: Of the one neighboring landowning household identified, none have expressed a clear stance for or against development, leaving their position classified as unknown. This neighbor is not known to hold any public office or leadership role, suggesting low community influence.
